about_the_game:
Everyone remembers happy childhoods picking out tapes with their family.

Getting gumballs from the machine, staying away from the forbidden back room...

90's Rental Store Horror

Rental is a narrative driven psychological horror puzzle game about Jasmine's new job at a VHS store. Your coworker Meg has left instructions on the desk. Your job is simple: finish your shift and don't enter the break room.

name: Rental Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Finish your shift. Ignore the monster. Question your reality.Rental is a short, psychological horror puzzle game demo set in a 90's video rental store. Complete tasks as Jasmine and don't enter the break room!
